item.title: Brooke add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Common sense is not so common." -- Voltaire

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Life is to be enjoyed, not endured" -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "If Life Gets Too Hard To Stand, Kneel." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Stop seeking out the storms and enjoy more fully the sunlight." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Spencer W. Kimball
item.description: "My life is like my shoes, worn out by service." -- Spencer W. Kimball

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Brooke add a quote by John Barrymore
item.description: "Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open." -- John Barrymore

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Remember who you are and what God expects you to become." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "A library is infinity under a roof." -- Gail Carson Levine

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Brooke add a quote by ~President Monson~
item.description: "Along your path through life, you will realize you are not the only traveler. There are hands to grasp, feet to steady, and souls to save." -- ~President Monson~

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Everyone can be discontented if he ignores his blessings and looks only at his burdens." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility. " -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Remember that ofttimes the wisdom of God appears as foolishness to men, but the greatest single lesson we can learn in mortality is that when God speaks and a man obeys, that man will always be right." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Faith precedes the miracle. It has ever been so and shall ever be. It was not raining when Noah was commanded to build an ark. There was no visible ram in the thicket when Abraham prepared to sacrifice his son Isaac. Two heavenly personages were not yet seen when Joseph knelt and prayed. First came the test of faith–and then the miracle. Remember that faith and doubt cannot exist in the same mind at the same time, for one will dispel the other. Cast out doubt. Cultivate faith." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Whatever our calling, regardless of our fears or anxieties, let us pray and then go and do." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Be of good cheer. The future is as bright as your faith." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Pres. Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "We learn to pray by praying. One can devote countless hours to examining the experiences of others, but nothing penetrates the human heart as does a personal, fervent prayer and its heaven-sent response." -- Pres. Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "When faith replaces doubt, when selfless service eliminates selfish striving, the power of God brings to pass His purposes." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "There will be occasions in each of our lives when we will be called upon to explain or to defend our beliefs. When the time for performance arrives, the time for preparation is past." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Our task is to become our best selves. One of God's greatest gifts to us is the joy of trying again, for no failure ever need be final." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Brooke add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "My dear sisters, do not pray for tasks equal to your abilities, but pray for abilities equal to your tasks. Then the performance of your tasks will be no miracle, but you will be the miracle." -- Thomas S. Monson
